description: This file contains utility functions for string manipulation, JSON parsing, and validation, including UUID validation, URL-safe string generation, SHA-256 hashing, and complex JSON content parsing with validation using Pydantic models.

methods.name: is_valid_uuid
methods.description: Checks if a string is a valid UUID.

methods.name: url_safe_string
methods.description: Converts a string into a URL-safe format by replacing spaces, converting case styles, removing special characters, and ensuring no consecutive dashes.

methods.name: hash_string_sha256
methods.description: Generates a SHA-256 hash of the input string.

methods.name: _extract_json_objects
methods.description: Extracts JSON objects from a text by balancing braces.

methods.name: _clean_json_content
methods.description: Cleans and prepares JSON content for parsing, handling markdown, code blocks, and escaping quotes.

methods.name: _parse_individual_json
methods.description: Parses and merges multiple JSON objects from content based on a Pydantic response model.

methods.name: parse_response_model_str
methods.description: Attempts to parse a string into a Pydantic model using multiple strategies, including direct validation, JSON loading, and extracting individual JSON objects.
